Textual elements: Nutrisco et extinguo written on scroll beneath shield, this was the motto of Francis I
Objects: Canopy of red cloth, helmet with jeweled crown and feathers, large jeweled crown above shield, blue shield with three fleur-de-lys flanked by winged stags with crowns around their necks, salamander engulfed in flames
Landscape: Grass ground
Other: The salamander was an emblem of Francis I. This scene is within an architectural frame. This is a full-page miniature.

Illustration title: Scribe Presents the Book to Francis I
Costume: Open gowns over doublets and hose
Objects: Book with a red cover being handed to Francis I, halberds, boat in water in the distance
Landscape: Body of water, trees, and distant land (seen through row of windows)
Architecture: Interior scene with a tiled floor and arcade windows
Other: This is a full-page miniature with an architectural frame
